name: NPR
text:
In newly released footage, former officer Tou Thao seems increasingly agitated as the crowd gets more vocal, with onlookers repeatedly asking why George Floyd's vitals weren't being checked.

At one point, Thao says, "This is why you don't do drugs, kids." https://t.co/RZmUeyihIs

name: NPR
text:
Cheryl Barnes, who has diabetes, tells @IowaPublicRadio she has nothing left to eat but bread after Monday's deadly derecho storm.

“I know my blood sugar has been high, so I have to be extremely careful.” https://t.co/1wQd6nDfyM

name: NPR
text:
As part of the deal to normalize relations with the UAE, Israel has agreed to suspend its controversial plans to annex territory in the occupied West Bank — territory Palestinians have long hoped to be a part of a future state.
https://t.co/VND7hsHhoD
